question: Who has been honoured with the 2018 Shri Jayadev Rastriya Yuva Pratibha Puraskar?
explanation: US-based Kathak dancer Anindita Anaam has been honoured with the prestigious \'Shri Jayadev Rastriya Yuva Pratibha Puraskar 2018\' for outstanding contribution to the field of art. The award was presented to the Kathak exponent during the \'Jayadev International Dance Festival\'.The 4-day festival that began on May 13 has been organised under the aegis of Odisha\'s culture department and National Culture Mission.
